tag_list: ralf-belusa, marketing, ecommerce, health2-0, epatient, healthcare, medical
overview:
Ralf Belusa is Senior Director at the global performance-based multichannel commerce company zanox.de AG
(A company of Axel Springer and Publigroupe).

He is Advisor, Investor and supervisory board member of several startups.

Before that he worked at Accenture and was Founder/Advisor (e.g. myby GmbH&Co.KG). He was Boardmember at ProMarkt, MakroMarkt, Yagma Online.

He studied Micro- and Nanotechnology at the University Munich, and was the first student at the LMU Ludwig-Maximilians-University Munich, who awarded a special doctoral accreditation in Humanbiology/Neurology (Prof. Dr. med. Dr. h.c. Thomas Brandt, FRCP)

Furthermore he finished his Masterstudies as a Master of Science in Systems Engineering (MSE) with his Thesis on Pharmacology & Process-Knowledgemanagement at the LMU and the Harvard Medical School, and also finished his PhD in experimental surgery and human cell research at the Humboldt-University Berlin and the University of Pittsburgh.

Ralf Belusa is member of the panel at
